definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Chronic conditions are managed equally well with chiropractic or yoga.
sentences.chinese: 慢性病通过脊神经疗法或者瑜伽均可获得显著疗效。

sentences.english: This is especially true if you’ve recently learned of your chronic ailment.
sentences.chinese: 如果你最近关注过你的慢性病，这个就显得特别正确。

sentences.english: Does this student have hereditary disease or chronic disease?
sentences.chinese: 该生有何遗传性疾病或慢性病？

sentences.english: Overweight and obesity, as well as their related noncommunicable diseases, are largely preventable.
sentences.chinese: 超重和肥胖及其相关慢性病在很大程度上是可预防的。

sentences.english: Asthma is chronical and very common.
sentences.chinese: 哮喘是慢性病，而且非常常见。

sentences.english: Residents of nursing homes and other chronic-care facilities.
sentences.chinese: 在疗养院和在其他慢性病治疗机构中居住的人员。

sentences.english: Many kind of senile disease and choric will easily outbreak and deteriorate at this time.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年病，慢性病就容易在这一时候发作，恶化。

sentences.english: Noncommunicable diseases (NCDs), also known as chronic diseases, are not passed from person to person.
sentences.chinese: 非传染性疾病又称慢性病，不会在人与人之间传播。

sentences.english: These countries are already shackled by the double burden of infectious and chronic diseases.
sentences.chinese: 这些国家已经承担了传染病和慢性病的双重负担。

sentences.english: Experts also agree that exercise can slow the physical deconditioning that results from chronic illness.
sentences.chinese: 专家也认同锻炼可以减缓慢性病导致的体力下降。

sentences.english: Sounds like the future of medical care for chronic diseases.
sentences.chinese: 听起来这像是慢性病医疗护理的未来。

sentences.english: The prevalences of chronic diseases and distribution of diseases in retired cadres were retrospectively analysed.
sentences.chinese: 回顾性分析被调查者慢性病的发病率和病种分布情况。

sentences.english: Thus, cancer is also considered a class of lifestyle-related chronic diseases.
sentences.chinese: 因此，癌症也被认为是一类与生活方式有关的慢性病。

sentences.english: Regular exposure to the drug causes chronic illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 常期接触这种毒气会导致慢性病。

sentences.english: Health development includes the chronic diseases and the neglected tropical diseases.
sentences.chinese: 卫生发展包括慢性病和被忽视的热带病。

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly

pinyin: man4 xing4 zu3 se4 xing4 fei4 bing4
